name: html-css-projects-collection
description: A collection of 10 HTML/CSS projects showcasing different web development techniques

scripts.dev: echo 'HTML/CSS projects ready! Open any project folder and view the index.html file in your browser.' && echo 'Available projects:' && echo '1. 01-portfolio-website' && echo '2. 02-product-card' && echo '3. 03-weather-dashboard' && echo '4. 04-restaurant-landing' && echo '5. 05-task-manager' && echo '6. 06-music-player' && echo '7. 07-blog-layout' && echo '8. 08-auth-forms' && echo '9. 09-dashboard' && echo '10. 10-coming-soon'

author: Huraira Amjad Jadoon
